name: Eugene DUDLEY, Appellee, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Township of Marple, Appellants
name_abbreviation: Dudley v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board
docket_number: Appeal No. 145 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1984

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
FLAHERTY and HUTCHINSON, JJ., note their dissent.
parties: Eugene DUDLEY, Appellee, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Township of Marple, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order of Commonwealth Court affirmed.
FLAHERTY and HUTCHINSON, JJ., note their dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: William J. McKee, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Howard Richard, Michael Paul, Leonard Tenaglia, Media, for Eugene Dudley.
casebody.head_matter:
507 A.2d 388
Eugene DUDLEY, Appellee, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Township of Marple, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 15, 1985.
Decided April 16, 1986.
William J. McKee, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Howard Richard, Michael Paul, Leonard Tenaglia, Media, for Eugene Dudley.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
